title: Fumbling
data:
**Fumbling** is a [property](/wiki/Property "Property") acquired extrinsically by wearing [gauntlets of fumbling](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_fumbling "Gauntlets of fumbling") or [fumble boots](/wiki/Fumble_boots "Fumble boots"). You also fumble when walking on [ice](/wiki/Ice "Ice") unless you are wearing snow boots or are naturally cold resistant (e.g. a [valkyrie](/wiki/Valkyrie "Valkyrie") or polymorphed into a [winter wolf](/wiki/Winter_wolf "Winter wolf")). Wearing cursed gauntlets of fumbling or fumble boots counts as a [minor trouble](/wiki/Minor_trouble "Minor trouble").

## Effects

- [Abuses](/wiki/Abuse "Abuse") [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") every five turns.

- Every d20 turns, you'll slip or trip and be helpless for 2 turns if you attempt to move that turn; if you're carrying more than a certain amount, you'll make noise and alert nearby monsters; if you're riding, you'll fall off.

- You fall when going down [stairs](/wiki/Stairs "Stairs").

- Your dexterity is abused if you try to move into a closed [door](/wiki/Door "Door").

- [Saddling](/wiki/Saddle "Saddle") ridable monsters is less likely to succeed.

- Attempting to mount a steed will always fail.

- [Digging](/wiki/Digging "Digging") with an implement may not succeed, and may cause it to hit you or be dropped.

- Your chance of disarming a [trap](/wiki/Trap "Trap") is halved.

- You have no chance of disarming a [container trap](/wiki/Container_trap "Container trap") or trapped [door](/wiki/Door "Door").

- You have no chance of escaping traps.

- Setting traps may cause them to go off.

- Applying [cans of grease](/wiki/Can_of_grease "Can of grease") can cause you to drop them.

- You are less likely when applying a [bullwhip](/wiki/Bullwhip "Bullwhip") to produce the desired effect, and may drop it instead.

- Kicking monsters or objects is less likely to be successful.

- As a [Valkyrie](/wiki/Valkyrie "Valkyrie"), [Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir") will hit your arm rather than be caught on its return.

- Your [multishot](/wiki/Multishot "Multishot") is impaired.

- Returning [boomerangs](/wiki/Boomerang "Boomerang") will hit you rather than be caught.

- The following items will end up on the floor rather than in your inventory:

  - [potions of oil](/wiki/Potion_of_oil "Potion of oil") that you light (if one of several)
  - wished-for items
  - tins made with a [tinning kit](/wiki/Tinning_kit "Tinning kit")
  - items from a [horn of plenty](/wiki/Horn_of_plenty "Horn of plenty")
  - [scrolls of mail](/wiki/Scroll_of_mail "Scroll of mail")
  - [gems](/wiki/Gem "Gem") thrown at you while you're a [unicorn](/wiki/Unicorn "Unicorn")
  - items stolen as a [nymph](/wiki/Nymph "Nymph")
  - weapons snagged with a bullwhip
  - [arrows](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow") created by the [Longbow of Diana](/wiki/Longbow_of_Diana "Longbow of Diana")
  - saddles removed from a steed
  - written [scrolls](/wiki/Scroll "Scroll") and [spellbooks](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook").

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.](/images/5/57/Nh366-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.")
html:
Fumbling

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Fumbling is a property acquired extrinsically by wearing gauntlets of fumbling or fumble boots. You also fumble when walking on ice unless you are wearing snow boots or are naturally cold resistant (e.g. a valkyrie or polymorphed into a winter wolf). Wearing cursed gauntlets of fumbling or fumble boots counts as a minor trouble.

Effects

  • Abuses dexterity every five turns.
  • Every d20 turns, you'll slip or trip and be helpless for 2 turns if you attempt to move that turn; if you're carrying more than a certain amount, you'll make noise and alert nearby monsters; if you're riding, you'll fall off.
  • You fall when going down stairs.
  • Your dexterity is abused if you try to move into a closed door.
  • Saddling ridable monsters is less likely to succeed.
  • Attempting to mount a steed will always fail.
  • Digging with an implement may not succeed, and may cause it to hit you or be dropped.
  • Your chance of disarming a trap is halved.
  • You have no chance of disarming a container trap or trapped door.
  • You have no chance of escaping traps.
  • Setting traps may cause them to go off.
  • Applying cans of grease can cause you to drop them.
  • You are less likely when applying a bullwhip to produce the desired effect, and may drop it instead.
  • Kicking monsters or objects is less likely to be successful.
  • As a Valkyrie, Mjollnir will hit your arm rather than be caught on its return.
  • Your multishot is impaired.
  • Returning boomerangs will hit you rather than be caught.
  • The following items will end up on the floor rather than in your inventory:
    • potions of oil that you light (if one of several)
    • wished-for items
    • tins made with a tinning kit
    • items from a horn of plenty
    • scrolls of mail
    • gems thrown at you while you're a unicorn
    • items stolen as a nymph
    • weapons snagged with a bullwhip
    • arrows created by the Longbow of Diana
    • saddles removed from a steed
    • written scrolls and spellbooks.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Fumbling&oldid=139570"

rawPage:
'''Fumbling''' is a [[property]] acquired extrinsically by wearing [[gauntlets of fumbling]] or [[fumble boots]]. You also fumble when walking on [[ice]] unless you are wearing snow boots or are naturally cold resistant (e.g. a [[valkyrie]] or polymorphed into a [[winter wolf]]).
Wearing cursed gauntlets of fumbling or fumble boots counts as a [[minor trouble]].

==Effects==
* [[Abuse]]s [[dexterity]] every five turns.
* Every d20 turns, you'll slip or trip and be helpless for 2 turns if you attempt to move that turn; if you're carrying more than a certain amount, you'll make noise and alert nearby monsters; if you're riding, you'll fall off.
* You fall when going down [[stairs]].
* Your dexterity is abused if you try to move into a closed [[door]].
* [[saddle|Saddling]] ridable monsters is less likely to succeed.
* Attempting to mount a steed will always fail.
* [[Digging]] with an implement may not succeed, and may cause it to hit you or be dropped.
* Your chance of disarming a [[trap]] is halved.
* You have no chance of disarming a [[container trap]] or trapped [[door]].
* You have no chance of escaping traps.
* Setting traps may cause them to go off.
* Applying [[can of grease|cans of grease]] can cause you to drop them.
* You are less likely when applying a [[bullwhip]] to produce the desired effect, and may drop it instead.
* Kicking monsters or objects is less likely to be successful.
* As a [[Valkyrie]], [[Mjollnir]] will hit your arm rather than be caught on its return.
* Your [[multishot]] is impaired.
* Returning [[boomerang]]s will hit you rather than be caught.
* The following items will end up on the floor rather than in your inventory:
** [[potion of oil|potions of oil]] that you light (if one of several)
** wished-for items
** tins made with a [[tinning kit]]
** items from a [[horn of plenty]]
** [[scroll of mail|scrolls of mail]]
** [[gem]]s thrown at you while you're a [[unicorn]]
** items stolen as a [[nymph]]
** weapons snagged with a bullwhip
** [[arrow]]s created by the [[Longbow of Diana]]
** saddles removed from a steed
** written [[scroll]]s and [[spellbook]]s.
